member.name: IDCompositionDeviceDebug.DisableDebugCounters
member.summary: Disables display of performance debugging counters.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionDeviceDebug.EnableDebugCounters
member.summary: Enables display of performance debugging counters.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionDeviceDebug
member.summary: Provides access to rendering features that help with application debugging and performance tuning. This interface can be queried from the DirectComposition device interface.
